realisations.title: Island project
realisations.description: Creation of a bot able to explore an unknown island and to find and collect a certain amount of resources

realisations.title: Android application
realisations.description: Creation of a game on android tablet. A question is send from server to android client. The user has to answer the question. If the answer is right, the next question location is send to the tablet.

realisations.title: DeViNT
realisations.description: Creation of a game for blind people. The player is drop in a sound environment and has to find the end of the level.
